The original tweet by Zarah Sultana: which depicted a woman carrying a tote bag with Arabic writing and a humorous translation, serves as the initial claim.
The translation of the Arabic writing on: which was transcribed by an Arabic speaker and then put through Google Translate, provides a rough English interpretation of the text.
The contact information provided by Zara: Israel-based Rock Paper Scissors Printshop, allows for further verification and potential communication with the company.
